title: KingsIsle Software
content:
Has anyone else heard about this new venture of Tom Hall? Or am I behind yet again?-----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.

title: Re: KingsIsle Software
content:
yea haha we heard about this a while ago. But i haven;t looked into it for a while. I saw a screenshot of what i think is a movie scene of the upcoming game, and it looks so awesome. (could be a movie scene, but with crazy ass game graphics these days, it could be regular game play).
Most likely it will be a pay-to-play mmorpg, so im most likely not going to even consider getting it.

title: If: KingsIsle Software could...
content:
Tom Hall could make a new keen game if id Software and KingsIsle Entertainment Inc worked together to make it.

Now how to talk id software into doing a new keen game?

Just thinking about it like raven software made games with id software.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

title: Re: If: KingsIsle Software could...
content:
Amusing, there's a Josef Hall in KingIsle team too. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Should make a good game with two Halls!

Anyways, I haven't heard much about the game they're doing, can someone link those screenshots or something? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
